programme.title: Colin Powell and "Mickey" Leland
programme.short_synopsis: Profiles of politicians Colin Powell and "Mickey" Leland (1944-1989)
programme.medium_synopsis: A profile of Colin Powell, the Chairman of the Joint Chief of Staffs appointed in 1989, and George Thomas "Mickey" Leland, the Congressman who worked to eradicate World hunger.
